title: Important Crypto Tax Info! (CPA Explains!)
description:

The #1 tax filing software. Choose your support level!

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
“CRYPTO THIS WEEK!!” 👨‍👩‍👦‍👦 NEWS EDITION! 📰

Hello, fam! Crypto Casey, here 👋 and I'm on a mission to improve people’s lives through #crypto education. In this video we interview a leading crypto #tax CPA on important topics: ways to prepare crypto tax returns, what’s taxable and what isn’t, long vs. short term capital gains, interest, penalties, and more! In the end we propose some solutions and resources to help with tax time!
